articles.title: British-Australian academic freed by Iran in apparent prisoner exchange
articles.description: Kylie Moore-Gilbert, the British-Australian academic detained by Iran for more than two years on espionage charges, has been freed in an apparent prisoner exchange for three Iranians.

articles.title: Hospital CEO out for refusing to wear mask after having Covid-19
articles.description: Former Sanford Health CEO Kelby Krabbenhoft wrote an email to 50,000 employees saying he wouldn't wear a mask after having Covid-19. Hospital employees were appalled and now he's out of a job.

articles.title: Army Corps denies permit for controversial mine that threatened salmon habitat in Alaska
articles.description: After a battle that spanned nearly 20 years and cost a Canadian mining company close to a billion dollars, the US Army Corps of Engineers has decided to deny a permit to blast open Pebble Mine near the salmon-rich headwaters of Bristol Bay, Alaska.
